'''v0.10.0 alpha build 3''' is the third build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.10.0 alpha|v0.10.0]], which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==

'''6 bugs fixed'''
* The game doesn't get stuck on a black screen anymore on devices where it happened.
* The player won't spawn anymore in the air or under bedrock.
* Resolved an issue in [[old]] worlds with specific seeds that could cause the world's spawn point to be placed inside the invisible bedrock border.
* Fixed a graphics corruption/crash happening when starting the game with Fancy OFF and turning it on.
* Fixed flickering terrain and water in the distance on some devices.
* The game doesn't freeze anymore when going to sleep.</onlyinclude>
